sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>NeedItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtils = Class.create();
NeedItUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	isDatePast: function(date){
		var rightNow = new GlideDateTime();
		var test = new GlideDateTime(date);
		
		if(test < rightNow){
			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
		}
	},
	
	isDateToday: function(date){
		var rightNow = new GlideDateTime();
		var test = new GlideDateTime(date);
		
		var today = rightNow.getLocalDate();
		var isToday = test.getLocalDate();
		
		if(isToday == today){
			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
		}
	},

    type: 'NeedItUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 06:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>9f334e77475711103802f088436d4361</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9f334e77475711103802f088436d4361</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 06:34:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
